# Order Seeds

SNP-Seek provides a seed ordering system for users to order seeds of rice varieties. This feature is available after logging in to the SNP-Seek database.

## Steps in Ordering Seeds
1. **Select** the list of accessions from the **User List** dropdown menu.
2. Click on "**Copy Accessions**" to copy your accession list.
3. **Visit <a href="https://gringlobal.irri.org/gringlobal/search" target="_blank">GRIN-Global IRRI</a>**. If you’re a first-time user, you’ll need to create an account first.
4. **Paste** your list of accessions into the **Search Box**

```{image} /_static/orderseeds.png
:alt: Homepage
:width: 600px
:class: zoomable
:align: center
```
